column1: Hamson was the eldest son of [[Gaffer Gamgee
column2: Hamfast Gamgee]] and [[Bell Goodchild]]. He moved to [[Tighfield]] to work with his uncle [[Andwise Roper

column1: The name means "Son of Ham", referring to his father, [[Gaffer Gamgee
column2: Hamfast]].<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
